attributes.additional_details:
Sentenced to death : Now murders have become 2nd 3rd or 4th page is the news on a daily basis this clearly shows how society has indeed changed.
Most will only serve a maximum 8 years for taking another life be it your child, mum, dad or aunt the overall time served will change little.
With today's technology like CCTV & DNA testing being 99% accurate convicting some of society's most ruthless killers. Do you think it is time we really questioned the current  justice system and let the Government hear our voice by introducing a death penatly
